item.title: Design
item.description: HyperChat Design Doc s/chat Date: 03/29/2020 Status: In Progress Objective Build a generic real-time chat infrastructure that is scalable to billions of users. Background Currently, there are 4 major large scale chat systems in the market: Facebook messenger Whatsapp Slack WeChat Telegram However, none of them provides easy to use APIs or libraries for small businesses to create their own custom service chat system or internal chat app.
